problem.p: Part 2. At the instant ball passes its lowest position, which statements are true? Check all that apply.

choice.text: The ball is in a state of equilibrium .
The acceleration of the ball is directed upward.
The acceleration of the ball is directed downward.
The acceleration of the ball is directed to the left.
The force of tension in the string is at a maximum.
The force of tension and the weight of the ball have the same magnitude.
